trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 代表可能的筆勢筆劃。

trans-unit.source: The results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 筆勢辨識器從結果。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether strokes should be considered a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出筆劃是否應視為筆勢。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event occurs, the value of the Cancel property depends on the first <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> in the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件發生時，[取消] 屬性的值取決於第一個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>所傳回的集合中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>, or if it is a gesture whose <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> is a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>, then Cancel is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>，或者它是筆勢其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>以外是值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>，然後取消`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Cancel is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就是取消`false`。

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> to its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 取消時`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>新增<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A>至其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `true`, the strokes are not added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 取消時`true`，筆劃不會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the strokes are ink; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the strokes are a gesture.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果筆劃筆墨;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果筆劃筆勢。

trans-unit.source: Returns results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 筆勢辨識器從傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the GetGestureRecognitionResults method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: GetGestureRecognitionResults 方法所傳回的集合依照<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, GetGestureRecognitionResults might return a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> objects with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，GetGestureRecognitionResults 可能會傳回具有下列值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>物件的集合: |索引 |ApplicationGesture |RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| 這表示，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>就很可能是可辨識的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>核取記號，可能會相當的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>中不鍵筆勢，和完全不可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>花體或 double 花體。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GetGestureRecognitionResults method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> with a higher degree of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than it has for other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > GetGestureRecognitionResults 方法可以傳回的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>具有較高程度的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>比它具有的其他應用程式的筆勢。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示很有可能會<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是不手勢，而不是具有較低<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>筆勢</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A collection of possible application gestures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*> might be.
trans-unit.target: 可能的應用程式的集合手勢，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>可能。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，提供特定類型的方式，可提高效率，透過基底實作叫用事件處理常式的方式。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 泛型處理常式 / 委派實作叫用。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 提供的處理常式應在其叫用的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表可能的筆勢的筆劃。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 代表可能的筆勢筆劃。
